articles.author: India Today News Desk
articles.title: Asian Games, Day 12 Live: HS Prannoy, Satwik-Chirag assure medals, twin gold in archery caps off solid day - India Today
articles.description: Asian Games, Day 12 Live Score and Updates: India's HS Prannoy and Satwik-Chirag assured medals for India on Thursday. Earlier in the day, Antim Panghal won bronze in her maiden appearance in the Asian Games while Saurav Ghosal clinched silver in men's squash…
articles.content:
India's Saurav Ghosal is currently level 1-1 against Malaysia's Eain Yow. Yow had been leading Ghosal 6-1 in the first game, but the 37-year-old India pulled things back and won 11-9.
The second gam… [+55 chars]

articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: PV Sindhu pours her heart out after Asian Games loss, gives example of Simone Biles and Naomi Osaka’s struggles - The Indian Express
articles.description: PV Sindhu has been struggling for form after a stress fracture last year;  'Losses give you a lot of downfall. But you have to make sure you are in the right mental state'
articles.content: Hangzhou: Until not so long ago, Indias most decorated badminton player, a serial winner and the ultimate big-game performer couldnt be defeated.Now, she cant win.This is the period when you go low a… [+5338 chars]
